Ampion, Inc. | Mid and Senior-level Software Engineers in RoR and React | DevOps engineer, SecOps experience a huge plus | Full Time | Boston, MA | ONSITE

Ampion provides an asset and customer management system for renewable energy providers. We specialize in complex and high volume back-office operations, real-time monitoring, and support renewable energy markets and programs across the country. On the whole, we are dedicated to an energy future that is affordable, sustainable, and universal.

We're looking for mid- and senior-level Full-stack RoR engineers as well as front-end specialists in React (with some exposure to Angular as we are transitioning from Angular to React).

We are also looking for a DevOps engineer. SecOps experience is a huge plus.

More details and apply here: https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/160945/senior-software-engine...
